mapper.select: select b.id, b.brand_name, b.company_name, b.ordered, b.description, b.status, t.type_name from tb_brand b, tb_type t where (brand_name like concat('%', #{searchInput}, '%')) or (company_name like concat('%', #{searchInput}, '%')) or (description like concat('%', #{searchInput}, '%')) or (type_name like concat('%', #{searchInput}, '%'));
